name: The Alien of the Occult Club
name_original: The Alien of the Occult Club
description:
The  Alien  of     The     Occult     Club is a slice of life visual novel in which you join chipper transfer student Ichiko as she sets out to start her new school life, make friends, and have lengthy inner monologues-- and she's all out of friends.

What awaits Ichiko in The Alien of The Occult Club? That all depends on you, player!

(This version of TAOTOC, including the above description, is an extremely early version of the title, is  in no way complete in any way shape or form, and may not represent the game's final form. Please understand.)
